Setting.Description: The URI used to access the ADFS instance, including the virtual directory (e.g https://contoso.com/adfs)
The optional value used as the 'resource' parameter (e.g urn:microsoft:userinfo)
The Elliptic Curve Digital Signature Algorithm (ECDSA) signing key associated with the developer account
The team ID associated with the developer account
The value used as the 'audience' parameter (by default, 'api.atlassian.com')
The value used as the 'prompt' parameter (by default, 'consent')
The URI used to access the Auth0 tenant (e.g 'https://contoso.us.auth0.com')
The preferred Battle.net region (by default, 'US')
The AWS region
The User Pool ID
The list of user fields to expand from the userinfo endpoint (by default, most common fields are requested)
The URI used to access the region-specific Exact Online server (by default, https://start.exactonline.com/)
The fields that should be retrieved from the userinfo endpoint (by default, only basic fields are requested)
The value used as the 'access_type' parameter (can be set to 'offline' to retrieve a refresh token)
The value used as the 'access_type' parameter (can be set to 'offline' to retrieve a refresh token)
The value used as the 'display' parameter (can be set to 'touch' to adjust the authorization page display style for mobile apps)
The URI used to access the Keycloak identity provider (including the realm, if applicable)
The Lark (Feishu) service region ('Global' for the global Lark by default, or can be set to 'CN' for Feishu)
The URI used to access the Mastodon instance (e.g https://mastodon.social/)
The list of user fields to expand from the GraphQL endpoint (by default, most basic fields are requested)
The tenant used to identify the Microsoft Entra instance (by default, the common tenant is used)
The value used as the 'access_type' parameter (can be set to 'offline' to retrieve a refresh token)
The value used as the 'approval_prompt' parameter (can be set to 'force' to display the consent form for each authorization demand)
The URI used to access the Nextcloud instance (e.g https://fabrikam.com/)
The URI used to access the Okta instance (e.g https://fabrikam.okta.com/)
The list of user fields to expand from the userinfo endpoint (by default, all known fields are requested)
The URI used to access the PingOne instance (e.g 'https://auth.pingone.eu/3bedc164-22f1-4f8f-9f51-227975033cbd/as')
The level of authentication requested, sent as part of the 'acr_values' parameter (by default, 'eidas1')
The TLS client certificate that will be used with the backchannel endpoints (while not enforced yet, its use is strongly recommended)
The value used as the 'duration' parameter (can be set to 'permanent' to retrieve a refresh token)
The URI used to access the Salesforce instance (e.g https://fabrikam.my.salesforce.com/)
The access mode (can be set to 'online' for per-user authorization)
The shop name (note: the shop name can also be set dynamically via the authentication properties)
The value used as the 'team' parameter (allowing to bypass the login screen if the user is already authenticated in the specified workspace)
The application key used to communicate with the StackExchange API
The site specified in userinfo requests (by default, 'stackoverflow')
The type of the Stripe account (by default, 'standard', but can also be set to 'express'). Note: the account type can also be set dynamically via the authentication properties
The list of user fields to expand from the GraphQL endpoint (by default, only basic fields are requested)
The list of data objects to expand from the userinfo endpoint (by default, all known expansions are requested)
The tweet fields that should be retrieved from the userinfo endpoint (by default, all known tweet fields are requested)
The user fields that should be retrieved from the userinfo endpoint (by default, all known user fields are requested)
The value used as the 'display' parameter (can be set to 'default', 'mobile', 'wap', 'client', or 'apponweibo' to adjust the authorization page display style)
The value used as the 'forcelogin' parameter (can be set to 'true' to force user to log in again)
The value used as the 'language' parameter (can be set to 'en' to display the authorization page in English)
The value used as the 'access_type' parameter (can be set to 'offline' to retrieve a refresh token)
The value used as the 'prompt' parameter (can be set to 'consent' to display the consent form for each authorization demand)
The preferred Zoho region (by default, 'US')
